QuestData.Title: The Battle Ring
QuestData.Description: We have some fresh trainees that are far from being a danger to you, but in numbers, they may prove enough of a challenge. And if not, they could use the lesson in humility.$B$BStep into the battle ring when you're ready. Don't go easy on them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat 20 Shado-Pan Trainees in the Battle Ring.
